authors.competingInterests: RP:CB: We disclose that EI, FT, JL, and NP are employed by and hold shares in Science Exchange Inc. The experiments presented in this manuscript will be conducted by IK at the Developmental Therapeutics Core and JC at Lifetein, which are Science Exchange labs.

content.text: Kandela I, Chou J, Chow K, Reproducability Project: Cancer Biology. 2015. Registered report: Coadministration of a tumor-penetrating peptide enhances the efficacy of cancer drugs. eLife 4:e06959. doi: 10.7554/eLife.06959

In the published Registered report there was an error in the iRDG peptide sequence listed in ‘Protocol 1: synthesis of iRDG’. The sequence was incorrectly listed as H-Gly-Arg-Gly-Asp-Lys-Gly-Pro-Asp-Cys-NH2. The correct sequence is: H-Cys-Arg-Gly-Asp-Lys-Gly-Pro-Asp-Cys-NH2.
This article has been corrected accordingly.
